content.question: The details included in the description of the garden (“The garden . . . grass”) in the first paragraph suggest the narrator’s interest in

choices.label: portraying the Vice President as a morally upright person
emphasizing the harmonious political relations within the country
drawing attention to people whose labor is often overlooked
highlighting the environmental damage caused by maintaining such gardens

content.answer: drawing attention to people whose labor is often overlooked

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain how a narrator's reliability affects a narrative.
